required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Initial Management in Patients With Differentiated Thyroid Cancer in the Real World in China
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-center Study to Observe Five-year Outcomes of the Initial Management in Patients With Differentiated Thyroid Cancer in the Real World in China (The Second Stage of DTCC)

lead_sponsor.agency: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

collaborator.agency: The First Affiliated Hospital of Kunming Medical College
First Hospital of China Medical University

clinical_study.source: Huazhong University of Science and Technology

brief_summary.textblock:
- To find out the gap between real-world clinical practice and guideline recommendations in initial management of DTC patients
- To observe the characteristics of patients who achieved and did not achieve TSH target value after five year follow-up
- To assess response to initial therapy in patients who undergo total or neartotal thyroidectomy and RAI remnant ablation after five year follow-up (according to an modified dynamic risk stratification system)
- To observe the recurrence status after five year follow-up

detailed_description.textblock:
The DTCC 2nd will follow DTCC 1st and observe the long-term efficacy of initial management including surgery treatment, 131I therapy and TSH suppression therapy. It will involve nine hospitals which have participated in the first stage, and continually to observe the DTC patients who were recruited. The patients with more than 5 years long-term follow-up from the date of signing the informed consent form (ICF) in DTCC 1st to signing ICF in DTCC 2nd will be collected data retrospectively. For those follow-up less than 5 years, in addition to the retrospective data collection, one prospective visit will be conducted.
Primary endpoint(s)
1.Five-year accumulated recurrence rate
Secondary endpoint(s)
1. Disease-free survival (DFS)
2. Overall survival (OS)
3. Response to therapy
4. Re-operation rate
5. Time weighted TSH level (TW-TSH)
6. Adverse events related to L-T4 therapy (ADRs)
7. Median follow-up years

secondary_outcome.description: Evaluated from the date of first-time thyroidectomy to the first to the progression date or death related to disease progression, whichever occurs first
Evaluated from the date of first-time thyroidectomy to the death for any reason
Presented by number of patients and proportions
the percentage of patients accepting operation due to DTC progression.

secondary_outcome.measure: Adverse events related to L-T4 therapy (ADRs)
secondary_outcome.description: The number of patients, number of ADRs and the incidence rate will be summarized for L-T4 therapy
Gained by statistical summary of median follow-up time

arm_group.description: About 1400 DTC patients with more than 5 years long-term follow-up from the date of signing the informed consent form (ICF) in DTCC 1st to signing ICF in DTCC 2nd will be collected data retrospectively.

study_pop.textblock: The patients are those who had been recruited into the first stage of DTCC study, including intermediate and high risk DTC patients.

facility.name: Wuhan Union Hospital, Tongji Medical College, Huazhong University of Science and Technology

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: Huazhong University of Science and Technology
responsible_party.investigator_title: Director of breast and thyroid department of Wuhan Union Hospital，Tongji Medical College
